name: Run For Baby!
description:
Welcome to the game about the poor man who goes to the market to feed his pregnant wife, hungry like a wolf in the middle of the night, who is exposed to her screams and the limited time she gives him!

Game Design: Hilal Uysal

3D Artist : Batuhan Başar Özdamar ( ig: @tyrja3d )

Developer: Faruk İlhan 

Sound Design: Hilal Uysal 

UI Design: Hilal Uysal 

Female Voice Actor: Hilal Uysal

Level Design: Hilal Uysal & Batuhan Başar Özdamar
